com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config

Interface ConfigurationLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssetsConfigurationLoader, InternalStorageConfigurationLoader, ResourcesConfigurationLoader

    public interface ConfigurationLoader
    An interface responsible for loading configuration parameters.
    Since:
    2012.04.09
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationFactory
      A factory component, which enables to load configuration parameters.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
      The exception used when something wrong happens with this configuration Java package component.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser<InputClass>
      A basis class which is able to create and fulfill a bean from a Properties object, and which will be used by the ConfigurationLoader derived classes, in order to parse the bean.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.JsonParser
      A helper class which is able to create and fulfill a bean from a JSON string.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.PropertiesParser
      A helper class which is able to create and fulfill a bean from a Properties object.
      static class  ConfigurationLoader.ResourcesParser
      A helper class which is able to create and fulfill a bean from the Android resources.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Logger log 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass)
      Responsible for loading and returning a Plain Old Java Object (POJO) of the given class.
      <T> T setBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass, T bean)
      Does the same thing as the #getBean(Class, InputStream) method, except that the POJO bean is provided.

    • Field Detail

      • log

        static final Logger log

    • Method Detail

      • setBean

        <T> T setBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass,
            T bean)
          throws ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
        Does the same thing as the #getBean(Class, InputStream) method, except that the POJO bean is provided.

        This method is especially useful, when a pre-defined configuration should be overwritten.

        Parameters:
        theClass - the type of the POJO which should hold the configuration
        bean - an already instantiated bean, which will be updated
        Returns:
        a valid POJO which holds the loaded configuration parameters
        Throws:
        ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException - if something unrecoverable went wrong during the processing
        See Also:
        #getBean(Class, InputStream)

      • getBean

        <T> T getBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass)
          throws ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
        Responsible for loading and returning a Plain Old Java Object (POJO) of the given class.
        Parameters:
        theClass - the type of the POJO which should hold the configuration
        Returns:
        a valid POJO which holds the loaded configuration parameters
        Throws:
        ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException - if something unrecoverable went wrong during the processing
        See Also:
        setBean(Class, Object)
